arts.ttl: Brest vs PSG – Paris lineup announced with Dembélé
arts.sum: This Saturday, Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) faces Brest (12th) at the Stade Francis Le-Blé in Matchday 9 of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kick-off at 5 p.m., CET). This Friday, Le Parisien announced a likely Parisian team: Barcola – Dembélé – Kvaratskhelia Lee – Vitinha – Zaïre-Emery Mendes – Pacho – Beraldo – Hakimi Chevalier. A team that […]
